sn11.24:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhu sampayojesum.
sn11.24:1.4: Atha kho so bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno santike accayam accayato deseti;
sn11.24:1.6: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn11.24:1.7: “idha, bhante, dve bhikkhu sampayojesum, tatreko bhikkhu accasara.
sn11.24:1.8: Atha kho so, bhante, bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno santike accayam accayato deseti, so bhikkhu nappatigganhati”ti.
sn11.24:2.2: Yo ca accayam accayato na passati, yo ca accayam desentassa yathadhammam nappatigganhati—
sn11.24:2.5: Yo ca accayam accayato passati, yo ca accayam desentassa yathadhammam patigganhati—
sn11.24:3.1: Bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo sudhammayam sabhayam deve tavatimse anunayamano tayam velayam imam gatham abhasi:
